experience.title: Data Scientist
experience.description: • Analysed South Korean market data to identify potential buyers of a beer brand for targeted media buying• Established pipeline to overcome challenges of implementing propensity modeling on a segement level data• Deduced methodology to apply the inferred results for core audience targeting on Facebook Ad Portal
experience.description_html: • Analysed South Korean market data to identify potential buyers of a beer brand for targeted media buying• Established pipeline to overcome challenges of implementing propensity modeling on a segement level data• Deduced methodology to apply the inferred results for core audience targeting on Facebook Ad Portal <!---->

experience.title: Data Scientist
experience.description: • Analysed weaving defects data on fabrics produced to identify their causes using dplyr library in R and Excel operations• Identified critical sources of defects which had significant level of production and showed high amount of defects per metre • Demonstrated to plant team heads how obtained results can be implemented in practical manner
experience.description_html: • Analysed weaving defects data on fabrics produced to identify their causes using dplyr library in R and Excel operations• Identified critical sources of defects which had significant level of production and showed high amount of defects per metre • Demonstrated to plant team heads how obtained results can be implemented in practical manner <!---->

positions.subtitle: Spring Fest

positions.subtitle: Spring Fest
positions.description: • Created and maintained Nation Wise Prelims Website for allowing participants to register themselves in the prelims across their city.• Conducted Freshers event by maintaining an online Portal for leaderboard scores and Load balancing across several events using Web Sockets and CSS framework.• Created Mobile Website for Spring Fest, which has an interactive theme based on Gyroscope and Accelerometer of the device using Parallax.js and AngularJS • Developed Fest Portal, an initiative to manage all activities of fest, using core PHP and JavaScript, formulated in MVC Format
positions.title: Technical Team Member (Sub Head)
positions.description_html:
• Created and maintained Nation Wise Prelims Website for allowing participants to register themselves in the prelims across their city.
• Conducted Freshers event by maintaining an online Portal for leaderboard scores and Load balancing across several events using Web Sockets and CSS framework.
• Created Mobile Website for Spring Fest, which has an interactive theme based on Gyroscope and Accelerometer of the device using Parallax.js and AngularJS
• Developed Fest Portal, an initiative to manage all activities of fest, using core PHP and JavaScript, formulated in MVC Format

projects: [{"title":"Chhuk Chhuk ( Web Application / Messenger Chat Bot)","start_date":"Nov 2016","description":"+ Web Application Based, Facebook Messenger Chatbot+ Designed on AI/ Machine Learning Background, to solve the queries regarding Railway Travels/ Booking+Secured Best Project in Microsoft's Online Code.Fun.Do (Application Development Hackathon) and Secured 3rd Position in the On Campus Code.Fun.Do. (Senior League), IIT KHARAGPUR+ Features Include:* All Basic Railway Enqueries like PNR, Live Status, Full Routes, etc. * Language Flexibility by Accepting Queries in local languages like Hindi, to support the major population of the country* Voice Input Enabled allowing user to enter his query, without typing a single word, by just communicating with the both with his voice"},{},{}]
